name: GreenText Game (GreenTape)
description:
Greentext Game or GreenTape (working title) is a game where you judge Greentext stories and other posts from 4chan in a court and choose whether to let the posters free or send them to jail. 

This is a prototype for the purposes of seeing if there is interest in this game. Let me know what you think!

[IMPORTANT: The game contains real posts from 4chan. The topics and posts the game includes will be unsettling or offensive for some.  For those who are easily offended or not 4chan users I would recommend waiting for the SAFE MODE setting to be implemented, which will censor the more controversial posts featured in the game]

Also:

The game uses a lot of placeholder (free) art and some music that you will probably notice also has to be replaced. If you are an artist and want to work on this let me know!

Notable asset sources:

https://noranekogames.itch.io/hana - Hana (Charmid) anime girl sprite

Assorted Free Music by Ahjay Stelino

Some other music and assets that have to be replaced if the project continues

you can also check out my videos at www.youtube.com/hakuhakuhakuen or the website for this game www.handrollgames.com

Thanks guys, enjoy!
